tarjetas.title: Unity Game Development
tarjetas.description: Create immersive 3D games with Unity. Learn C# programming, game physics, and professional game development...
tarjetas.prerequisites: Basic programming knowledge in any language. Understanding of 3D geometry is helpful but not required.
tarjetas.whatYouWillLearn: Build complete 3D games, master C# programming, implement game physics, create engaging UI systems, and optimize game performance.
tarjetas.structure: 24 interactive lessons, 12 hands-on projects, 4 major game development assignments, and a final capstone project.

tarjetas.title: Unreal Engine Basics
tarjetas.description: Master the fundamentals of Unreal Engine 5. Cover Blueprint visual scripting, level design, and game...
tarjetas.prerequisites: No prior experience required. Basic computer skills and understanding of gaming concepts recommended.
tarjetas.whatYouWillLearn: Create basic games using Blueprints, design game levels, implement basic AI, and understand game optimization techniques.
tarjetas.structure: 16 lessons, 8 practical exercises, 4 mini-projects, and a final game project.
